data.meta_description: Revco LLC is a Los Angeles, CA based company incorporated on August 21, 2023. Discover contact details, principal and mailing addresses, incorporation details, filing and reporting history.
data.text:
Revco LLC is a business entity based in Los Angeles, CA. Established recently on August 21, 2023, this Limited Liability Company is recognized under the document number 202358712384. Governed by the California Secretary of State, the company is listed in Active status in state records.

The principal and mailing address of the company is situated at 130 S Avenue 63, Apt 1/4, Los Angeles, CA 90042. This address serves as the central hub for the company's activities and communications.

Overseeing the operations and compliance of this Limited Liability Company is Charmaine Gapuz, who serves as the registered agent. He operates from 700 W 9th St Suite 720, Los Angeles, CA 90015.
